seniority_level.evidence: Title is 'Data Engineer' without senior/staff designation; no years of experience specified; responsibilities suggest mid-level work (data integration, ETL, cloud migration) without leadership expectations

job_family.evidence: Job title explicitly states 'Data Engineer'; core responsibilities focus on data gathering, storage, ETL, and integration

sub_specialty.evidence: Explicit mention of ETL tool (Informatica PowerCenter), data warehousing, and batch processing; 'both batch and real-time' suggests batch is primary focus

leadership_expectation.evidence: No mention of mentoring, managing teams, or technical leadership; role focuses on execution and collaboration, not direction or people management

primary_cloud.evidence: MS-Azure Cloud listed as preferred skill; 'Cloud' as must-have implies Azure given IBM's enterprise focus and Azure partnership

secondary_clouds.evidence: No other cloud platforms mentioned in must-have or nice-to-have skills

processing_paradigm.evidence: Explicitly mentions 'both batch and real-time processing' in responsibilities

orchestrator_category.evidence: No orchestrator tools (Airflow, Dagster, etc.) mentioned in skills or responsibilities

storage_layer.evidence: Explicit mention of 'Data warehousing' as must-have skill; Power BI and ETL tools typically used with data warehouses

remote_restriction.evidence: Location restricted to 'Navi Mumbai, Maharashtra, India'; onsite work model specified

timezone_focus.evidence: Location explicitly limited to India; no mention of global or multi-timezone teams

relocation_required.evidence: Onsite work model + specific location (Navi Mumbai) implies relocation required for non-local candidates

h1b_friendly.evidence: Location is India; no mention of visa sponsorship; IBM India typically hires locally

opt_cpt_friendly.evidence: Location is India; OPT/CPT are US-specific visas; no indication of student visa support

citizenship_required.evidence: Location in India implies authorization to work in India is required; no citizenship requirement stated

w2_vs_1099.evidence: Employment type is 'full_time' and 'permanent' contract; typical for W2 employment in India

benefits_level.evidence: No benefits listed in extraction; 'ext_benefits_mentioned' is empty array

growth_path_clarity.evidence: Mentions 'growth opportunities' implicitly through 'delivering deep technical expertise' but no specific career tracks or promotion paths

mentorship_signals.evidence: Mentions 'collaborating closely with diverse teams' and working in 'Client Innovation Centers' which implies learning from experienced colleagues

promotion_path_mentioned.evidence: No explicit mention of promotions, advancement, or career progression in job description or extraction

internal_mobility_mentioned.evidence: No mention of internal transfers, role changes, or mobility opportunities

career_tracks_available.evidence: No career tracks (IC, management, specialist, architect) mentioned in job description or extraction

requirement_strictness.evidence: Clear distinction between must-have (13 skills) and nice-to-have (1 skill); no 'preferred' or 'desired' language, but not overly rigid

scope_definition.evidence: Focused on data engineering with specific tools (Informatica, Power BI, SQL, Python) and domains (data warehousing, ETL, cloud migration)

skill_inflation_detected.evidence: Skills listed (ETL, SQL, Python, cloud) are reasonable for a mid-level data engineer; no unrealistic combinations or senior-level expectations
